task.instruction: Your user id is mei_hernandez_8984. You want to fly from the LaGuardia Airport in New York city to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport on May 28 (one way). You have to reach airport in between 7:30 PM to 8:15 PM before the actual time departure time of the flight which is 9:00 PM. You want to fly in basic economy and you want to ensure that the overall cost does not exceed more than 150 since you have to pay the remaining team’s end-of-quarter dinner expenses. You need to select the flight which have the cheapest base fare for the basic economy. You prefer direct flights without any stopover. You have total 2 baggages. You do not want any kind of insurance. You want to use your gift card that ends with 5309492 number to pay. Your birthday is in your user profile so you do not prefer to provide it unless it is being asked and mandatory for the booking.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
I need to book a flight from LaGuardia Airport in New York to Phoenix.

Sure—let’s get started with your booking. Could you please provide:  
1. Your user ID  
2. Trip type (one-way or round-trip)  
3. Departure date (and return date if round-trip)  
4. Number of passengers  
5. Preferred cabin class (basic economy, economy, or business)
My user ID is mei_hernandez_8984. It's a one-way trip on May 28 for just one passenger in basic economy.

traj.name: search_direct_flight
traj.content: [{"flight_number": "HAT002", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "21:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "01:30:00+1", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 3, "economy": 11, "business": 10}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 50, "economy": 138, "business": 499}}, {"flight_number": "HAT114", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "21:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "01:30:00+1", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 20, "economy": 5, "business": 11}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 59, "economy": 129, "business": 227}}, {"flight_number": "HAT150", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "19:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "23:30:00", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 3, "economy": 13, "business": 15}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 71, "economy": 195, "business": 394}}, {"flight_number": "HAT201", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "03:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "07:30:00", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 8, "economy": 8, "business": 8}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 54, "economy": 133, "business": 289}}, {"flight_number": "HAT219", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "14:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "18:30:00", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 20, "economy": 13, "business": 0}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 99, "economy": 148, "business": 307}}, {"flight_number": "HAT245", "origin": "LGA", "destination": "PHX", "scheduled_departure_time_est": "00:00:00", "scheduled_arrival_time_est": "04:30:00", "status": "available", "available_seats": {"basic_economy": 19, "economy": 11, "business": 8}, "prices": {"basic_economy": 90, "economy": 193, "business": 352}}]

Here are the available nonstop options on May 28 from LGA → PHX (basic economy):

• HAT002 Dep 21:00 EST Arr 01:30 (1 day later) $50  
• HAT114 Dep 21:00 EST Arr 01:30 (1 day later) $59  
• HAT150 Dep 19:00 EST Arr 23:30 EST $71  
• HAT201 Dep 03:00 EST Arr 07:30 EST $54  
• HAT219 Dep 14:00 EST Arr 18:30 EST $99  
• HAT245 Dep 00:00 EST Arr 04:30 EST $90  

1. Which flight number would you like to book?  
2. Please provide the passenger’s full name and date of birth.  
3. Would you like to add travel insurance at $30 per passenger?  
4. How many checked bags will you be bringing? (You may have free bags based on your membership; extra are $50 each.)
I'll go with flight HAT002. Just to note, I do not want any travel insurance and I'm bringing 2 bags. How should we proceed with the payment?

traj.name: get_user_details
traj.content: {"name": {"first_name": "Mei", "last_name": "Hernandez"}, "address": {"address1": "675 Sunset Drive", "address2": "Suite 623", "city": "Dallas", "country": "USA", "state": "TX", "zip": "75379"}, "email": "mei.hernandez3561@example.com", "dob": "1981-01-11", "payment_methods": {"gift_card_5309492": {"source": "gift_card", "amount": 98, "id": "gift_card_5309492"}, "credit_card_2140654": {"source": "credit_card", "brand": "mastercard", "last_four": "1698", "id": "credit_card_2140654"}, "certificate_7502997": {"source": "certificate", "amount": 250, "id": "certificate_7502997"}, "certificate_3321326": {"source": "certificate", "amount": 250, "id": "certificate_3321326"}, "credit_card_6082923": {"source": "credit_card", "brand": "visa", "last_four": "3202", "id": "credit_card_6082923"}}, "saved_passengers": [{"first_name": "Anya", "last_name": "Anderson", "dob": "1959-05-28"}], "membership": "gold", "reservations": ["R9QDGB", "07S7FC", "79G8A9", "1AKIA8"]}

Your total for flight HAT002 (basic economy) is $50. As a Gold member you get 2 free checked bags, so your two bags incur no extra fee, and you declined insurance. 

You may pay with one of the following on-file methods (one certificate or gift card, or one credit card):  
• gift_card_5309492 (Balance: $98)  
• certificate_7502997 (Balance: $250)  
• certificate_3321326 (Balance: $250)  
• credit_card_2140654 (Mastercard ••••1698)  
• credit_card_6082923 (Visa ••••3202)  

1. Which payment method would you like to use?  
2. Please confirm the passenger’s first name, last name, and date of birth.  

Once I have these, I’ll summarize all booking details for your confirmation before finalizing.
I would like to use the gift card that ends in 5309492 to pay. As for the personal details, my name is Mei Hernandez. Do I need to provide my date of birth for this booking?

Yes, we do need each passenger’s date of birth to complete the booking.

Here’s what I have so far:
• User ID: mei_hernandez_8984  
• Trip: One-way LGA → PHX on 2024-05-28  
• Flight: HAT002 (Dep 21:00 EST, Arr 01:30 +1)  
• Cabin: Basic Economy  
• Passengers: 1 (Mei Hernandez – DOB needed)

• Checked bags: 2 (all free)  
• Payment: gift_card_5309492  

Please provide Mei Hernandez’s date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD). Then I’ll summarize all details for your final confirmation before booking.
My date of birth is already in my user profile. Can you please check there to complete the booking?

I’ve retrieved your date of birth from your profile: 1981-01-11.

Here’s the complete booking summary:

• User ID: mei_hernandez_8984  
• Trip type: One-way  
• Route: LGA → PHX on 2024-05-28  
• Flight: HAT002 (Dep 21:00 EST, Arr 01:30 EST next day)  
• Cabin: Basic Economy  
• Passenger: Mei Hernandez (DOB 1981-01-11)  
• Travel insurance: No  
• Checked bags: 2 (both free)  
• Payment method: gift_card_5309492  

Please reply “yes” to confirm and finalize your booking, or let me know if you need any changes.
Yes, this looks perfect! Please go ahead and finalize the booking.

If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

Hi! I’m looking to book a flight from LaGuardia Airport in New York to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport on May 28th.

Sure—let’s get started with your booking. To proceed, I need a few details:

1. Your user ID in our system  
2. Is this a one-way or round-trip? (If round-trip, please also provide your return date.)  
3. Cabin class (basic_economy, economy, or business)  
4. Number of passengers  

Once I have that, I can search available flights for May 28 and guide you through the next steps.
My user ID is mei_hernandez_8984. It's a one-way trip, and I'd like to fly basic economy. It's just for one passenger—me!

Here are the available basic-economy options on May 28 from LGA to PHX:

• Flight HAT002 — Depart 21:00, Arrive 01:30 (+1) — \$50  
• Flight HAT114 — Depart 21:00, Arrive 01:30 (+1) — \$59  
• Flight HAT150 — Depart 19:00, Arrive 23:30 — \$71  
• Flight HAT201 — Depart 03:00, Arrive 07:30 — \$54  
• Flight HAT219 — Depart 14:00, Arrive 18:30 — \$99  
• Flight HAT245 — Depart 00:00, Arrive 04:30 — \$90  

Which flight number would you like to book?
I'd like to book Flight HAT002, the one departing at 21:00 and arriving at 01:30.

Great choice! To complete your booking for Flight HAT002 on 2024-05-28 in basic economy, I need a few more details:

1. Passenger information:  
   • First name  
   • Last name  
   • Date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD)  

2. Checked baggage:  
   • Basic economy includes 0 free checked bags. Do you want to add any checked bags? Each extra bag is \$50. If so, how many?  

3. Travel insurance (\$30 per passenger): yes or no?  

4. Payment method: Which of the following on file would you like to use?  
   • credit_card_xxx  
   • gift_card_xxx  
   • certificate_xxx  

Please provide these details and then I’ll summarize everything for your confirmation.
Sure! My first name is Mei, and my last name is Hernandez. I'll add 2 checked bags. No travel insurance, please. And I'll use my gift card ending with 5309492.

Thanks! I just need one more detail before summarizing:

• Passenger date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD)

Please provide your DOB so I can prepare the booking summary for your confirmation.
Could you check if my date of birth is already in my user profile? I prefer not to provide it unless it's absolutely necessary.

• Mastercard ending 1698: \$52  

Thank you for booking with us! Have a great trip.
Thank you so much for your help! I appreciate it. ###STOP###

task.instruction: Your user id is mei_hernandez_8984. You want to fly from the LaGuardia Airport in New York city to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport on May 28 (one way). You have to reach airport in between 7:30 PM to 8:15 PM before the actual time departure time of the flight which is 9:00 PM. You want to fly in basic economy and you want to ensure that the overall cost does not exceed more than 150 since you have to pay the remaining team’s end-of-quarter dinner expenses. You need to select the flight which have the cheapest base fare for the basic economy. You prefer direct flights without any stopover. You have total 2 baggages. You do not want any kind of insurance. You want to use your gift card that ends with 5309492 number to pay. Your birthday is in your user profile so you do not prefer to provide it unless it is being asked and mandatory for the booking.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi! I'm looking to book a one-way flight on May 28th. Can you help with that?

Sure! I can help you book a one-way flight on May 28th. To get started, could you please provide:  
1. Your user ID  
2. Your departure airport (city or IATA code)  
3. Your arrival airport (city or IATA code)
My user ID is mei_hernandez_8984. I'd like to fly from LaGuardia Airport (LGA) to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX).

What flight number would you like, and in which cabin class? Also, please provide passenger details (first name, last name, date of birth for each traveler). Finally, let me know if you’d like to add checked baggage or purchase travel insurance (\$30 per passenger).
I would like to book the Basic Economy on Flight HAT002. I have two baggages. Can I skip the insurance part?

traj.name: get_user_details
traj.content: {"name": {"first_name": "Mei", "last_name": "Hernandez"}, "address": {"address1": "675 Sunset Drive", "address2": "Suite 623", "city": "Dallas", "country": "USA", "state": "TX", "zip": "75379"}, "email": "mei.hernandez3561@example.com", "dob": "1981-01-11", "payment_methods": {"gift_card_5309492": {"source": "gift_card", "amount": 98, "id": "gift_card_5309492"}, "credit_card_2140654": {"source": "credit_card", "brand": "mastercard", "last_four": "1698", "id": "credit_card_2140654"}, "certificate_7502997": {"source": "certificate", "amount": 250, "id": "certificate_7502997"}, "certificate_3321326": {"source": "certificate", "amount": 250, "id": "certificate_3321326"}, "credit_card_6082923": {"source": "credit_card", "brand": "visa", "last_four": "3202", "id": "credit_card_6082923"}}, "saved_passengers": [{"first_name": "Anya", "last_name": "Anderson", "dob": "1959-05-28"}], "membership": "gold", "reservations": ["R9QDGB", "07S7FC", "79G8A9", "1AKIA8"]}

• Trip: One-way  
• Flight: HAT002 on 2024-05-28, Basic Economy (\$50 per passenger)  
• Checked bags: 2 total  
  – As a Gold member, you get 2 free checked bags per Basic Economy passenger, so no baggage fee.

1. How many passengers will be traveling?  
2. For each passenger: first name, last name, and date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD).  
3. Which payment method would you like to use? You can choose up to one credit card, one certificate, and/or up to three gift cards from your profile.  

Once I have that, I’ll summarize the full cost and ask you to confirm.
Just one passenger. I'll be using a gift card with the number ending in 5309492 for payment. Do you need any other information from me?

Here’s the complete booking summary for your review:

• Trip type: One-way  
• Flight: HAT002 on 2024-05-28, Basic Economy (\$50)  
• Passengers (1):  
  – Mei Hernandez, DOB 1981-01-11  
• Checked bags: 2 (you’re Gold, so both are free)  
• Travel insurance: none  
• Payment: gift card ending 5309492 (\$50 total charge)  

Please confirm that everything is correct. If so, reply “yes” and I will finalize your reservation.
Yes, everything looks good. Please go ahead and finalize the reservation.
